title: Kathryn Bigelow
summary: Kathryn Ann Bigelow (/ˈbɪɡəˌloʊ/; born November 28, 1951) is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter.[1] Covering a wide range of genres, her films include Near Dark (1987), Point Break (1991), Strange Days (1995), K-19: The Widowmaker (2002), The Hurt Locker (2008), Zero Dark Thirty (2012), and Detroit (2017).
